alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Southwest San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued December 28 at 6:35AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE COLORADO AVALANCHE INFORMATION CENTER. * WHAT...Avalanche Warning * WHERE...CAIC Forecast Zones: Vail and Summit County, Sawatch, Aspen, Gunnison, Grand Mesa, North and South San Juan zones * WHEN...Beginning 7:00AM Tuesday December 28. Expires at 7:00AM Wednesday December 29. * IMPACTS...Very dangerous avalanche conditions exist in the mountains. Heavy snow and strong winds will result in natural avalanches. Human triggered avalanches are very likely on Tuesday. Avalanches can break wide and run further than you might expect. You can trigger avalanches from below or from a distance. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...Avoid travel on and under all steep slopes. Travel in avalanche terrain is not recommended. Consul www.colorado.gov/avalanche for detailed information. Cooperstein
